The space tech conference 2020

The free-to-attend conferences bring together professionals in the space industry in Europe and beyond to discuss current trends, developments and challenges in the market, innovative and ground-breaking technologies.
watch

Call for papers open

The Space Tech Expo Europe team is excited to announce that the call for papers for the 2020 show is now open. We are now developing the industry Conference, Smallsats Conference and Technology Conference agendas and welcome your input into our research, as well as inviting you to submit your own talk proposals.
conference
Smallsats
View More
conference
Technology
View More

Space tech expo europe 2020 will focus on themes including the following

  • Space System Developments
  • Downstream Requirements
  • Smallsats Trends
  • Future Industry Trends
  • Programs And Missions
  • New Space Approaches
  • Digitalisation And Software
  • Subsystem Developments
  • Services From Space
  • Tech Developments
sunday 31st may, 2020
Smarter Shows reserves the right to amend speakers, topics and scheduling at any time. This website is updated regulary to refflect such changes.

Deadlines & selection criteria

Speaking slots are allocated on merit and relevance to the topics on the agenda. Commercial presentations - such as product of company reviews - will not be accepted. There are no registration fees to take up this opportunity. Speaking slot timings and formats will be finalised as the program is completed, depending on the subject matter to me addressed.

For any questions please contact

Nicole Heins - Senior Conference Producer
nicole.heins@smartershows com
Europe: +44 1273 916264
Toll free: +1 855 436 8683
